rules_text:
Flying, trample
Whenever you attack, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
{2}{U}{U}: Olpisnam connives, then phases out. [i](To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
